plot: Every morning, very early, Pablo drives to the beach to meet up with Pedro Almodovar. Pablo knows that Pedro lives in Madrid, and that Madrid is very far away from the sea.
title: Pedro tiene dos perros
plot_es: Every morning, very early, Pablo drives to the beach to meet up with Pedro Almodovar. Pablo knows that Pedro lives in Madrid, and that Madrid is very far away from the sea.
plot_en: Every morning, very early, Pablo drives to the beach to meet up with Pedro Almodovar. Pablo knows that Pedro lives in Madrid, and that Madrid is very far away from the sea.
